title: Sidewall, "Marigold", 1925
description: Vertical ascending serpentine bands of foliage and flowers, with regular repeat. Four color combinations: a) dark neutral green on light neutral green; b) green on light green; c) green on cream; d) neutral dark blue on olive.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, "Marigold", 1925.
1925. Block-printed on paper. Gift of Robert W. Friedel. 1941-74-4-a/f.
